Reviews.Title: “A quiet palce to stay in a vibrant city”
Reviews.Author: lumponmyhead
Reviews.Content: hotel situated stones throw western vondelpark arriving central station 2 tram save 25 euros taxi hotel quiet residential upmarket street near lots restaurants couple coffee shops supermarket mean bathrooms en suite styled clean nights sleep ive hotel bed comfy noise street staff efficient buy tickets museums advice staff city useful vondelpark amazingly peaceful loud noise youd stick mile hotel suits couples families family happy apart tv amuse kids kids amusement youll doing kids own amusement buy treating beds trampoline recieved phone call politely stop bit quieter dealt

Reviews.Title: “Brilliant weekend”
Reviews.Author: Gail154
Reviews.Content: fantastic stay slightly beaten track perfect base hotel looking staff friendly start helpful arrived amsterdam hotel drop bags checked hotel ready fantastic comfortable beds heaven breakfast start day plenty selection choose happy stay

Reviews.Title: “Great stay”
Reviews.Author: anonymous186337
Reviews.Content: hotel quiet residential vondelpark average size amsterdam cosy clean towels replaced daily doubt nights sleep ive experienced amsterdam hotel staff helpful offering coffee arrived official check times round corner provides restaurants bars food world albert heijn supermarket closeby amsterdam nightlife hotel probably leidseplein provide perfect base relaxing holiday hundred yards vondelpark price paid hotel faulted definitely staying

Reviews.Title: “FANTASTIC STAY”
Reviews.Author: BBunni
Reviews.Content: fantastic stay boyfriend february 2012 25th birthday lovely safe location transport links tram 2 takes city centre 20mins stop hotel 5 mins tram stop check simple speedy paid city tax checked 5euros gorgeous double bed requested 3rd floor lift convenience compact modern clean kept bed soo comfy bouncy bathroom lovely tiled floor ceiling modern beige nice fittings clean fab double shower perfect water pressure left sign door disturbed maid left fresh linen outside door appreciatedthe perfect size didnt spend time happy size flat screen tv english channels travel kettle bits bobs hot drinks tray extra pillow boyfriend promptly reception card letting dealt quickly fuss single complaint service appreciated laid efficient style breakfast comment overall fantastic stay definatley booking dont stay close action dont mind short trip centre everyday value money pleasurable experience

Reviews.Title: “Nice and small hotel in a residential area”
Reviews.Author: Bartho0
Reviews.Content: nice hotel nice quiet residential near vondelpark nearby restaurants 58 minutes walk tram line 1 2 minutes city center furnished clean sleep breakfast quality quantity breakfast fine hotel stay amsterdam youre probably expensive hotel center

Reviews.Title: “Clean, nice area but a little out of centre”
Reviews.Author: Joanne R
Reviews.Content: husband spent days little figured using tram tram system bought 3 day ticket trams 10 mins short walk hotel hotel clean negative bit 10 euro breakfast passed finding expensive nice coffee shops close nice bagel half price

Reviews.Title: “Great Value, lovely quiet location, excellent transport links”
Reviews.Author: rangoon34
Reviews.Content: boyfriend stayed weekend arrived 9am happy bags luggage surprise receptionist straight additional cost described trip adviser reviews read compact clean floor towel outside wetroom easily tiny bathroom floor dry 2 tram stops hotel easy access city hotel door vondelpark lovely walk feels upmarket safe extremely quiet advice breakfast 10am bit disappointing items available chilly night able heating fair wed actually im wouldve sorted tired descent ground floor hairdryer heat didnt definately stay recommend friends

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic Hotel in a good location. Great if on a budget.”
Reviews.Author: jennyrob669
Reviews.Content: partner stayed nights october 2011 hotel 20 euros taxi central station walk vondel park city center takes 20 minutes hotel basic double bed bathroom toilet shower tv available wifi hotel free receptionist lovely guide amsterdam told trams cheapest easiest amsterdam building renovated opposite hotel youre travelling soon believe add pictures building started 8am loud 2 nights live breakfast continental tasty enjoyed stay hotel travelling amsterdam

Reviews.Title: “Great value for Amsterdam”
Reviews.Author: kamelia60
Reviews.Content: nice clean extremely easy city centre central train station tram 2 location busy canals 10min tram ride clean comfortable value amsterdam park surrounding extremely nice

Reviews.Title: “Awesome: centre, clean, comfortable!”
Reviews.Author: OlenaOlena
Reviews.Content: hotel clean tidy fresh renovated furniture staff friendly helpful hotel beautiful park centre amsterdam city center reachable 5 minutes tram walk park hotel located nice quiet highly recommended

Reviews.Title: “Delightful Amsterdam Inn with comfy beds”
Reviews.Author: MiaPoppy
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel central park visiting daughter family live neighborhood warm friendly welcome received matt arrival returning nights expect friendly cozy experience neat clean breakfast virtually exception cook juices breads meats fruit cereals traveling adjust expectations size pleasantly surprised hospitality helpfulness staff especially matt

Reviews.Title: “I didn't expect it to be so good”
Reviews.Author: Filip82
Reviews.Content: hotel breakfast morning leave hungry clean everyday housekeeper cleans sum hotel bit town amsterdam time alot extra sight seeing 3040mins walk centre 5mins tram costs

Reviews.Title: “Nice, clean efficient hotel”
Reviews.Author: normangorman
Reviews.Content: enjoyed hotel located distance town centre 2 tram nearby single journey 260 toilet wet bit served purpose adequate breakfast european style youd expect probably wouldnt stay city centre minute booking pleased

Reviews.Title: “GREAT SERVICE, CLEAN AND MODERN ROOM BUT VERY SMALL”
Reviews.Author: DazNGez
Reviews.Content: double comfortable beds located town 10min bike ride 30min walk located edge vondelpark spot dont stay centre activity neighbourhood quiet safe recommend staying getting bicycle explore city staff speak english helpful breakfast included extra pretty decent stay

Reviews.Title: “So far away from the centre of town”
Reviews.Author: jodelicious
Reviews.Content: hotel wetroom bathroom internet site booked siad central location 20 min tram ride thats figured tram arrived late night cab driver idea spent hour walking residential trying returning town night cab driver idea nice stay nearer town

Reviews.Title: “Clean, comfortable, modern but quite a bit outside city centre”
Reviews.Author: ireland8282
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel march 3 nights advertised website walking distance city centre entirely true estimated 50 minutes walk city centre trams run stop near hotel minutes costing 260 euro adds plus clean comfortable modern hotel quiet location recommend dont mind trek
